neurologic: Left pronator drift when holding arms out in front.
Ataxia of the left arm on finger-to-nose testing.
Unable to keep balance while sitting unsupported.
Unable to stand on her own.
Mild clumsiness in left arm and leg during finger tapping and heel-to-shin testing.
Deep tendon reflexes: 2+ in both arms and 3+ at both knees.
Several beats of clonus at both ankles.
